publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3468.3 Shona Robison: Delivering for Health—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3468) in the name of Mr Andy Kerr, leave out from “supports” to end and insert “, and considers that more needs to be done to bring down waiting times for patients, including the introduction of individual patient waiting time guarantees based on their particular needs, the expansion of diagnostic and treatment centres within the NHS and the introduction of an element of activity-based payment for hospitals to encourage greater efficiency and utilisation of spare capacity in the NHS.”
